paudgalika prawahana sewa amathi si. bi. rathnayaka, janamadhya ha prawruththi amathi keheliya rambaukwalla, grama sanwardhana ha kantha katayuthu amathi thithsa karalliyadda yana mahathwaru athulu prabhuwaru rasak me awaththawa daka bala ganimata pamina sitiyaha.anthar palath bath himiyange sangamaya saha jathika gamanagamana komishama me pethsame athsan dasha lakshaya laba ganime wadapiliwela sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.mehi di adahath dak wu kolambaa wishwawidyalaye aacharya prathibha mahanama hewa mahatha adahath dakwamin “eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya nikuth kala me warthawa shri lankawe kirthiya wikruthi kirimata idiripath kala paudgalika warthawak bawa kiya.

koti praharayen winasha wu layan eyar yanaye maginge mala siruru goda ganima arambaayi dinasena rathugamage punarin sita el.ti.ti.ee. misayila praharayakin winasha wu layan eyar guwan yanaye siti maginge mala siruru godaganime katayuthu eeye (09 wanida) perawaruwe kilinochchi disa winisuru em. el. wahabdin mahathage pradhanathwayen punarin kawudarimuneyi pradeshayen aarambha kerini. 1998 sapthambar masa 29 wanida layan eyar samagamata ayath antanow 24 wargaye guwan yanayak ehi gamangath karya mandalayada athulu magin panas pas denaku samaga el.ti.ti.ee. misayila prahara hamuwe maha muhudata kada watini.
